attributes.action: Street Lights to be reinstated in Keyworth and other affected areas.
attributes.additional_details: I would like Nottinghamshire County Council to amend their decision to switch off street lights at night within Keyworth and other affected areas, in order to protect residents, their properties, and maximise chances of catching criminals who offend in the dark.

rejection.details: This is a matter, as the petition acknowledges, for the County Council.
